actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title I, X, XIV and XVII of the Social Security Act so as to permit Federal reimbursement to States for two-party payments under the programs of aid or assistance for the aged, the blind, and the disabled in the same way as is presently permitted under the program of aid of families with dependent children.

summary.text: Permits Federal reimbursement to States for two-party payments under the programs of aid or assistance for the aged, the blind, and the disabled under titles I, X, XIV, and XVI of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title I, X, XIV and XVII of the Social Security Act so as to permit Federal reimbursement to States for two-party payments under the programs of aid or assistance for the aged, the blind, and the disabled in the same way as is presently permitted under the program of aid of families with dependent children.
